page.title: 07ENTERTAINMENT-VILLAGE HALL
page.content: The Village Hall was opened on the 6th of August 1971 by Mrs M.E.G. Bonner-Maurice.There are quite a few things that are held in the Village hall,including bingo,whist drives, bowling and funeral teas.Bingo is every Tuesday and whist drives are on a first Friday of a month.Every year the Village Show is held and sometimes dances are organised.The Evergreen Club meet once a week and the Womens Institute once a month.There is a caretaker who looks after the Village Hall.There has been a changing room extension to the Village hall which was opened on the 17th of May 1985 by{ {Dai Davies},Ex-Welsh International goalkeeper. {
